item.title: Microsoft Defender Office 365 Manual Mailbox Purge AKA We Have ZAP At Home
item.description: This will be the start of my series of ongoing best practices and tips I’ve picked up handling incident response and business email compromises in Office 365. One of the better features in Microsoft Defender for Office 365 is the Zero-hour auto purge. This will still use the threat intelligence data that Microsoft gathers to retroactively pull malicious items out of mailboxes that have gotten past their initial spam, phishing and malware filters.

item.title: Finally, a blog.
item.description: Every time I’ve attempted to blog in the past it’s only ended in two or three posts, and then me getting frustrated with managing wordpress and it’s awful ecosystem instead of getting my thoughts out. Hopefully this ends up in better results. Using Hugo with the PaperMod theme, it appears to offer a pretty clean look and very low impact. hugo basics Spin up temporary server to preview site as built:
